EmailTemplate.subject: Only A Day Left for The Ffreedom Day!!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Registration__c.Name},
"Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be" – Abraham Lincoln.
We thank all our Ffreedom Family members& their friendswho have confirmed their Invitations/RSVPs & made up their mind to come to the Ffreedom Day event.
The whole Ffreedom Team isvery excited & looking forward to meet you at the Ffreedom Day tomorrow at Hotel Novotel, Juhu [erstwhile Holiday Inn].
Please Join us in the morning for a Cup of Coffee at 10 am, accompanied with somerefreshments.
Looking forward to see you at the event.
1 Day to go for the Ffreedom Day…… Venue: Hotel Novotel,Juhu Beach, Juhu-Vile Parle (west). Mumbai - 49. Brief Program Schedule: 10.30 am to 11.00 am – Registration (with Tea, Coffee & Refreshments) 11.00 am to 11.15 am – Opening Ceremony by the Chief Guest 11.30 am to 12.15 pm – Ffreedom Talks on Happiness 12.15 pm to 01.00 pm – Ffreedom Talks on Dreams 01.00 pm to 01.30 pm – Panel Discussion on Financial Freedom 01.30 pm to 01.45 pm – Closing Ceremony 01.45 pm onwards – Lunch & Cocktail
Best Regards, Ffreedom Financial Planners.
